recipees.recipee_description: The name says it all – just relish it with tall glass of chilled lemonade Serving Suggestion : Serve with a glass of chilled lemonade.
The name says it all – just relish it with tall glass of chilled lemonade Serving Suggestion : Serve with a glass of chilled lemonade.
The name says it all – just relish it with tall glass of chilled lemonade Serving Suggestion : Serve with a glass of chilled lemonade.

cookingMethod: Preheat the oven to 375º F / 180º C. Grease the muffin moulds and dust them with a little dry flour or line them with paper liners.Take refined flour, baking powder, salt and sugar in a mixing bowl and mix well.Drain the pineapple slices and reserve ¼ cup juice. Crush the slices.Prepare a well in the middle of the dry ingredients, add egg and the reserved pineapple juice, ¼ cup melted butter and milk and mix well.To make topping, take ½ cup flour in another bowl, add cinnamon powder, remaining melted butter and brown sugar and mix prepare the garnishing.Pour the batter into the prepared muffin moulds till ½ full and put some crushed pineapple on top. Sprinkle the topping mixture on top.Keep the muffin moulds in the preheated oven and bake for ½ hour. Prick a toothpick into the muffins, if it comes out clean the muffins are done.Arrange them on a serving platter and serve.
